email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $50.00 per metric ton, but that’s the best I can do given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan is still 15-20 October? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement by end of day today. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the prompt follow-up. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Please proceed with the booking. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! The booking is confirmed. I’ll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
